txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The goblins have found iron across the river to the south. They have done a great deal to flatten a hill-top and dig deep within it, going so far as to bring trolls to aid them. The more iron the Enemy has and the more weapons the Enemy has, the harder fought the battle becomes.\n\n'Head across the river and defeat the goblins and trolls mining within Ghâmpronk.'
'The goblins will come back, but even a few days without mining means a lot more weapons the Enemy will not have.'
'Are you ready to venture across the river to Ghâmpronk?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
The goblins have flattened a hill in their search for iron.
Defeated goblins and trolls at Ghâmpronk ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat goblins and trolls at Ghâmpronk ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Goblins and trolls can be found at Ghâmpronk.\n\nWaldeg asked to venture to Ghâmpronk and defeat the goblins and trolls mining within.
Waldeg is at Snowbourn.\n\nWaldeg will be pleased to hear the goblins are no longer mining at Ghâmpronk.
